sentences.en: A snail leaves a trail of slime behind it on the ground.
sentences.cn: 蜗牛在地上运动时在后面留下黏液的痕迹.

sentences.en: Acrasiomycota ( cellular slime molds ) A class of protoctists in the phylum Rhizopoda.
sentences.cn: 集胞粘菌门 ( 细胞状粘菌 ):根足亚纲的一类原生生物.

sentences.en: But in return you dragged the entire race into the slime!
sentences.cn: 可是你反过来将整个民族拖进了泥坑!

sentences.en: Dust and slime of many years had covered the panes of glass.
sentences.cn: 玻璃框上盖满了多年的尘埃烂泥.

sentences.en: Frogs produce slime to keep their skin moist.
sentences.cn: 青蛙分泌出黏液来使皮肤保持湿润.

sentences.en: He got coated with slime from head to toe.
sentences.cn: 他弄得从头到脚都是泥.

sentences.en: He swam down and retrieved his glasses from the muck and slime at the bottom of the pond.
sentences.cn: 他潜下水去，从池塘底部的烂泥污物中找回了眼镜。

sentences.en: Slim swans and slender skunks swim in the slippery slime.
sentences.cn: 苗条的天鹅和纤细的臭鼬在滑滑的黏泥上游泳.

sentences.en: The pond was full of mud and green slime.
sentences.cn: 池子里满是淤泥和绿色的污水。

sentences.en: The slime layer consists of one aerobic and one anaerobic sublayer.
sentences.cn: 粘膜层由好气分层和厌气分层所组成.

sentences.en: The snail left a trail of slime along the floor.
sentences.cn: 蜗牛在地板上留下一道黏液.

sentences.en: Their skin produce a slime that help to keep it moist.
sentences.cn: 它们的皮肤产生一种黏液,帮助保持皮肤润湿.

sentences.en: Their skin produces a slime that helps to keep it moist.
sentences.cn: 它们的皮肤产生一种粘液,帮助保持皮肤润湿.

sentences.en: There was a coating of slime on the unwashed sink.
sentences.cn: 未刷洗的水槽上有一层污垢.

sentences.en: There was an unappealing film of slime on top of the pond.
sentences.cn: 池塘表面有一层黏腻腻的污泥。

sentences.en: Will you think less of me if I call him a slime bucket?
sentences.cn: 如果我叫他饭桶,你对我的印象会不会变差?

words.tran_cn: 黏滑的；泥泞的；谄媚的，虚伪的

phrases.tran_cn: 阳极泥；阳极残渣；阳极沉积层

trans.tran_en: Slime is a thick, wet substance which covers a surface or comes from the bodies of animals such as snails
